title: The Christian gouernour, in the common-wealth, and priuate families described by Dauid, in his 101. Psalme. Guiding all men in a right course to heauen. Herewith also a part of the parable of the lost sonne. Luke 15. Both expounded and opened by Robert Horn. With the doctrines and vses thence arising. The more particular contents see on the page following.
author: Horne, Robert, 1565-1640.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Francis Burton, and are to be solde at the greene Dragon, in Paules Church-yard,
